title: My other account is stuck in between 2 servers for over a day! Need help riot!
body:
Hey so i transfered my account for oce to eune, and ive been stuck in the transfer for more than a day, what this means is i cant log in on eune, and when i try to login on oce it says that its in the process of transfer.

I cant login on riot sites to write to their support because the account is stuck in between the 2 servers...
.
Really need help! Hopefully a rioter will see this

replies.body: You'll need to reach out to our account team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so that we can get that account pushed over to the region you need it on. You'll be able to get through to that team without signing in by making sure you pick the option "I need help recovering my account".
